```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(easypackages)
libraries("tidyverse", "magrittr", "ggplot2", "scales", "corrplot", "knitr", "kableExtra", "poLCA", "conflicted")
walk(c("filter", "select", "count", "group_by"), ~ conflict_prefer(., "dplyr"))

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F, message = F)

rm(list = ls())

df <- readRDS(file = "S:\\TRACK to TREAT\\Data\\Processed Data\\prognostic_pessimism_working_data.rds")
```

```{r}
df %>%
  select(contains("b.y.cause"), contains("b.y.change")) %>%
  cor(use = "pairwise.complete.obs") %>%
  corrplot()

df %>%
  select(contains("f.y.cause"), contains("f.y.change")) %>%
  cor(use = "pairwise.complete.obs") %>%
  corrplot()

grid.arrange(p1, p2, nrow = 1)
```
